Reviews.Title: “Low price across from old town would stay again”
Reviews.Author: debilee313
Reviews.Content: The room was clean ,had some cable and 2 HBO channels.We walked to eat and the indoor flea market and old town and the fun spot.Also right behind McDonalds.We stayed there for 2 nights and had no problems .Its well lit and the staff was friendly.You have to pay extra for wireless service but not much,I didnt bother I just used the internet on my cell.We paid $70 for 2 nights so I would stay there again. It also has room service though we didnt use it.If it had a fitness center i didnt see it,only a pool and vending machines.

Reviews.Title: “Average motel, some maintenance and deep cleaning needed.”
Reviews.Author: keithandmissy
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night while driving through the area. However, the room was adequate and was the typical no-frills Motel 6 style. However, the curtains were broken and we were stuck in a smoking room (for non-smokers this is not so nice). With hotels all over Orlando sold out for the night this served as a good place to rest our heads and get on the road the next morning. There are lots of options in the area for a cheap breakfast. However, the staff at the motel were rude and snarky. When I told one to have a good day she replied, "Well, I'm at work," and then moved on to assist the next guest. That's unacceptable customer service in my opinion. Otherwise the stay was fine.

Reviews.Title: “OK for the price”
Reviews.Author: rosetta66
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night at the motel 6 March 17th 2012. Pro's: Clean, friendly staff, quick check in, great location, across the street from Old Town and right behind a McDonalds. Con's: Small would be the name for this place. There are many buildings in the complex but the rooms are really small, so small that the two beds took up the entire space. There was a pool but it was small and a laundry room but again really small only two washing machines. The ice machine and vending machines were in the lobby so that was a bit of a pain. No microwave or fridge. I only stayed for one night the beds were comfortable and the hotel was quite. This is a clean quiet place. It is OK for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap stay close to Magic Kingdom”
Reviews.Author: cmanasian
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking for a one night stay at the cheapest place in the area. For only 38 dollars for the night this motel did its job. It had a pool and the room we had was very clean. Yeah the beds weren't the softest but still a good value for a day at Disney

Reviews.Title: “Happy here after reviewing many, many Kissimmee Hotels/Motels”
Reviews.Author: sleeplessinjax
Reviews.Content: I spent many nites surfing the Web, reading reviews, prices, etc. and just on a fluck, decided to take a chance on Motel 6, booked 1 night, amazed at a spotless room/bath, everything worked, the cleanest basic place I needed. In the morning, I paid for 3 additional nights, good location, near Disney. Will surely return. Stayed here Dec/4-5-6/2011. FEAR NOT and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “Infestation!!”
Reviews.Author: Jesse R
Reviews.Content: If you enjoy playing exterminate then this is the place for you! I checked in late and just about an hour of being in my room i had to complain of the infestation of roaches and spiders. First thing to great me in my room was a roach in the tub, and after that about nine others followed. They came out from the back of the bed boards and the counter tops. I had to move the bed away from the wall hoping they will not crawl on us while we sleep. I immediately took our bags to the car for fear of them laying eggs, and at this point it was so late in the night that i had to stay sleeping there. I went to sleep in my jeans and sweater hoping i don't wake up with bitten. The next morning i didn't even shower or use the bathroom because they don't look like they get cleaned after every stay. The carpet had weird stains, i reserved a non-smoking room but got a smoking room which was almost impossible to breath. The next morning I got a refund for the night and the following day we had booked. The staff didn't seem surprised and they tried getting rid of us quickly so others checking in don't hears us. Ended us at a best western and wow, what a difference an extra $15 bucks makes!

Reviews.Title: “Poor quality.”
Reviews.Author: TexasTimon
Reviews.Content: Quite close to Disney world and there is a smaller amusement park across the street. Rooms are really cheap (42 $) but not very nice. This motel have not been remodelled for several years and is one of the worst I've seen.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: CharlotteTennessee
Reviews.Content: My company transfered me to Kissimmee and put me up in this Motel 6 and I have to say the management and staff were wonderful.They always went out of their way to make sure my stay was a pleasent one. Drew the new GM is awsome and a very guest oriented individual and the AGM Christine is just as pleasant. I highly recommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place on a budget (Recession Relief)”
Reviews.Author: JOHNJAX76
Reviews.Content: Money tight, yet the motel accomidated my family at a low price of 25 dollars a night, the room was very clean and the other patrons seemed not to mind one another. Hidden gem.

Reviews.Title: “Excemptional Motel 6”
Reviews.Author: Michael L
Reviews.Content: This is a sprawling two story complex in the heart of the tourist district of Kissimmee. Recently updated, it is well located, well maintained, quite, comfortable and a wonderful value in an otherwise pricey area. The rooms are clean, pleasant, comfortable and large. Adjacent Studio 6 offers kitchenette facilities for longer stays or families on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Definetely worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Sammyeyes4u
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean.. I stayed in room 235...wish it had small fridge but overall u have everything u need for s great price. The sheets are clean... The towels r clean... However the blanket under the bed spread is really rough.. Kinda icky to the touch. I would definetely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “Got what you paid for”
Reviews.Author: Cking09
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Motel 6 line of motels before. They are slowly going downhill. The dead bolt stuck so you had to play with it to lock it and it would also stick opens so you could not close the door even when you had not used it. The internet that you have to pay for doesn't work in every room which they do not tell you at during check in. You can move rooms or call the 800 to have them try to fix it but they will not refund the 2.99 the charge for it. The worst was the bed. We had two full size in our room, the one had the springs coming up thru the mattress. I think you should check your beds before allowing guest to stay in it. This was one of the cleanest Motel 6 I have been in..shockingly

Reviews.Title: “A Good Bargain”
Reviews.Author: jcopel05
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this motel off and on for 3 months since Febrauray 2010.I plan on returning there again next week.I usually pay $22.00 per night.At those rates i don't expect nothing but basic clean accomodations,and that's exactly what i get.The rooms does not have microwaves nor refridgerators.WiFi is available for $2.99 per day.There's a swimming pool and laundry room.The motel is located right accross from old town and close to many eateries and attractions.Also the motel is pet friendly.Now the cons,the rooms are super small,but since I travel alone it's not a problem for me,it might be for a family.The carpet in the downstair rooms tends to be soiled,I always ask for a room upstairs since i noticed that most people with pets prefer downstairs. At $2.99 per day for WiFi.to me it's seem rather pricey, but i found that most days i could connect with the Hilton hotel next door for free.There's only about 10 or so t.v. channels.I just rent $1.00 movies and watch them off my laptop or sometimes if I know ahead i will be there at least a week or longer,then I'll bring a small dvd player,a microwave , a travel iron, and a cooler.It might seems like a lot but the last time i stayed there for almost 30 days, so what i saved overall far out weighs any inconviences.One other tip,if you turn right on Irlo Bronson from the motel there's 2 buffet restuarants that serve breakfast,skip the 1st and go instead to the 2nd one which is about a block & 1/2 going west.The food is fresher,taste better and it's cheaper.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE-DIRTY-UNCOMFORTABLE”
Reviews.Author: thelesters2009
Reviews.Content: We chose this place because it is right across from old town and a large fun spot. Great location, great price. Absolutely WOULD NOT stay here again.!! There were dead bugs in the light in the bathroom-LARGE bugs. The beds were very stiff. Not a good nights sleep. Pillows smelled musty...(we always take our own pillows for this reason) We had two double beds. Pulled back the covers on one, and there was a dead bug in the sheets..(couldnt tell if it was a bedbug or not), the other bed had a bloodstain on the sheets. We had to strip the bed, and lay on top of the comforter. I felt very uncomfortable being in that room and would never stay in another motel 6 again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but I'll spend a little more next time.”
Reviews.Author: swfloridafamily
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one evening as we went to Epcot and WDW, so it was just basically a place to sleep for us. The rooms were very small, beds tiny (my husband is not even 6' tall and his feet hung off the bed!), basically no amenities (not even shampoo/conditioner, etc.) but it was fairly clean and the bedding seemed like it had been changed recently. The staff was friendly, I appreciated the fact that they didn't require a credit card to hold the room in advance. There was an Elvis Car Convention that weekend, so the place was pretty full the night we stayed there. On the plus side, the location is great as it is only a few miles from WDW. It's also located right behind a McDonalds which was very convenient for us. Truth is, you get what you pay for and, with the low prices, we didn't expect much to begin with. But there also seemed to be some "seedy" types staying there too. At about 4am a fight broke out between a couple outside the rooms with horrible language and screaming, waking us up and leaving us unable to get the rest we needed. Can't blame the hotel for that, but some hotels just seem to attract that kind of clientele, if you know what I mean. Next time we'll spend a little more for a nicer place and a good night's sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Spend a little extra and go else where”
Reviews.Author: kristy9442
Reviews.Content: We checked in got our rooms and they are very small rooms. The next day we went to Seaworlds new water park got back to the room around 7 pm and saw something on the air unit it was baby lizards coming through the air unit. I lost it called the front desk they answered and hung up on me. So I walked up to the office and asked for the mgr. she was already gone for the day and I informed him what was going on and told him we would be checking out asap. I think we had everything loaded in 10 mins. He gave me my money back for both rooms for the rest of our stay. This happened in room 173 near the pool area. We left with our swim suits still on there are so many other hotels in that area. I would not stay at the hotel again and dont waste your money on the wi fi card it would not work and we took it right back within 5 mins and was told we could not get our money back on it, That was the first day we got there.

Reviews.Title: “Better than a bus shelter but you get what ya pay for.”
Reviews.Author: Sybock
Reviews.Content: It is an ok motel. Room small...no shampoo...just a bar of soap. Bit of a musty smell in the room..think it was the A/C. Wife wasn't impressed. I would suggest staying somewhere else if you can..I generally don't mind Motel 6 but this one is on my list of not to stay at. Front desk was friendly. The only shining star about the place.

Reviews.Title: “Not as nice as it used to be”
Reviews.Author: guavagirlKW
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel several times on trips between Florida and Michigan. In the past, while the rooms are very small, they have always been clean and the price was good. This time the price was higher, the room was not very clean, and the other visitors were very disrespectful. Since it was November there were not a lot of people and yet the hotel placed a large group of rowdy people immediately next to us. We retired early since we wanted to get an early start. The people next door arrived after that and immediately began partying. The didn't stay in the room but rather grouped directly outside our door drinking and talking. This began at about 1:30 a.m.. At 4:30 we finally realized they were not going to stop and got up, showered and left. At 5:30 they were still going strong and had to move aside to allow us to leave. We did not phone the office for fear of repercussions from this group of young people. Obviously the hotel has no security monitoring the grounds or these people would have been told to go indoors or leave. With all the choices available in Kissimmee, this place is no longer the value it once was. We will be looking elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Probably not again”
Reviews.Author: cantshutmeup
Reviews.Content: We live about 2 hours from Orlando, and when visiting for shows, etc...we stay at this Motel 6. We had previously had excellent service and stays here and the price couldn't be beat as well as the proximity to Disney. This past weekend we thought we'd sneak away to Orlando and when we pealed back the covers after a sho, about midnight, a cockroach ran across the covers. It was late and we were exhausted so rather than leave and drive back home, we attempted to sleep, but didn't. We won't be back.

Reviews.Title: “Eh... Not bad for the $$ but could use some improvements.”
Reviews.Author: Zoiezmom
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel well ahead of schedule on Saturday 6/29. Customer service at the front desk was great and we were granted an early check-in with no problem. Room is a tad on the small side when compared to the average. There are 2 full size beds, each with a side pushed up against the wall and a 2 foot space between them. Like I said, very small. Perfectly adequate if you just need a place to rest your head but probably not much more. The pool was nice but guests didn't adhere to the hours posted. People were swimming and lounging well past the closing time of 9:30. This was a tad annoying while trying to get to sleep. Toiletries are not standard. There was one bar of soap in the room but we were were happily given a few more when requested. When I pulled back the blankets there was quite a bit of hair on the sheets. I don't think they were changed between guests. I made sure they had to change them when we left by completely pulling them off the bed. Overall, this wasn't a horrible place. It really wasn't that bad for the price. Request fresh sheets if you need to and ask for a room away from the pool and you should be fine.

Reviews.Title: “it was not as great as i thought it was going to be!”
Reviews.Author: jessephilly79
Reviews.Content: On arrival to the hotel, we were not greeted with a hello or anything!! the lady in front just looked at us as we walked in. There was hardly any cars on the property because jan. is a low season! We were placed at the very back of the hotel!!! rooms were available everywhere and we got stuck in the back by the loud deisal's that came in and out in the mornings and at night! Every time we opened the door to go outside gnats were every where!! The rooms were so small. We could not unpack our clothes from our suit case because there was not a dresser to put our clothing in!! The beds were not made and one bed had a nasty pillow on it with no casing. We had to have our keys redone everyday to get into our room, and when we would go in and say our key didnt work, the lady would say, did you pay this morning..I was like HELL yeah ...i payed by credit card for the whole freaking week now quit messing with the key!! that part made me really mad! So we slept on top of the covers all week long!!Trip was great but i will never ever stay at that hotel again!!

Reviews.Title: “Super clean and pet friendly!”
Reviews.Author: teresareiner
Reviews.Content: We found this place by accident. We went to Orlando for the day to see the Buccaneers srping training. Once we were there we decided to stay over and so we needed a place that had availability right away. We were reccomended to the Motel 6 by a woman selling discount tix. When I found out that the room was only $37 a night I started to get nervous, but I was in for a big shock...it was GREAT! They were in the process of renovating all of the rooms so the one that we stayed in ahd fresh paint and new linens. We are going back this weekend and bringing our dog (since they are pet-friendly) and are very excited to know a place we can go and have a clean room without spending a lot of money!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: AllenH
Reviews.Content: The motel was convenient to Disney area. The rooms were very clean but small. Great price.

Reviews.Title: “Not as Good As the Last Time”
Reviews.Author: Leighmo
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times previously and things were just not as good this time as the have been. We will, however, give it another chance next time we are in town and want to stay in a budget motel.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Families on a Budget!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: If I had listened to some of the postings here prior to staying at this motel, I probably would not have made reservations here. However, for a budget motel, we had a terrific experience. The room was clean, the service was fast and friendly and we were close to all the attractions. For $37.99 per night, you don't get the Taj Mahal and you don't get luxury and lots of extras. If you want that stuff, stay in a resort-style hotel and pay $200.00 or more per night. If you want to stay somewhere for less than $40 a day, this place is great!

Reviews.Title: “Good service and nice place”
Reviews.Author: Corretje71
Reviews.Content: The price of this Motel is really great for what you get. It's a big motel with a lot of rooms (over 300) in a nice formation. There are 2 pools! A friendly staff, it was clean and the attractions were in the neighbourhood. When we arrived in our room, it was very smelly, but we think there were pets before us. In the evening of our stay, the smelly was gone! There is no fridge in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Surprise”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed here from March 12th to March 20, 2005, and have to say we were very pleasantly surprised. Look, we go to Orlando twice a year and never stay at the same motel twice. (To keep things new.) And for the past 5 years everyone of the hotels we have stayed at, including the $100 a night ones, have always had something wrong with them. However this motel at $32 a night had exactly what we needed. Clean room, clean bathroom, cable tv with hbo, great water pressure in the shower, and friendly staff that welcomes you and helps you in anyway they can. There is even a letter in the lobby that says that if the staff can't help you then they will call the owner to see what they can do to make your stay better. Great location with Old Town directly across the street, and many restaurants and shopping area right there within walking distance. Look, if you need a good clean room and are looking to save money take it from someone who goes twice a year for the past 12 years, stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Motel Ever”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: When we checked into the motel on Feb. 25, 2005 it seemed nice since we wouldn't be in the room that much. We checked in and went out most of the evening but when we came back to the room to relax since we had traveled all day, the room was small and we had no cable t.v. The Bed was up against the window and room was not all that clean. We told the manager on duty about the t.v. and she claimed there were no more rooms that she could move us to even though there were. Her attitude about the whole situation was terrible and claimed we could not get a room any place else because everyone was booked, but to her embarrassment we got a room that was much more nice right next door at the TraveLodge Hotel. The TraveLodge hotel I would recommend because their staff is excellent. The room at Motel 6 might be cheap but for a little more money you can have a view with a nice pool and game room at the TraveLodge Hotel. As the saying goes you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Overall very pleased with hotel, but check cleanliness of bathroom!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with hotel, room had been completely renovated (it looked like it at least), nicely furnished and great rate of $31.99 per night! Also, a really great location, in the heart of the Kissimmee strip, close to Celebration and very close to Disney. About a 20 min. drive from Sea World via I-4. Nice! Only problem was our hotel bathroom, the toilet specifically. Noticed that the bottom part of the toilet was slightly smeared with what appeared to be either vomit or diaharrea, as well as a little on toilet tank and on wall by toilet paper. Only slightly smeared and no smell, but still gross. Left note for housekeeper (and a couple bucks) to please clean it up. Were very disappointed when got back to room that night and found that only bottom of toilet had been cleaned, not top or wall, so we cleaned it ourselves. Other than this one small problem (it honestly wasn't as gross as it sounds!) I would recommend the hotel again in a heartbeat, but I would just check the cleanliness of the bathroom before taking the luggage up, so that I could change rooms if needed.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for the price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised at how clean the property is. Great place if you are seeing the attractions in Orlando and on the economy plan. New carpet, new paint, clean rooms, nice area close to everything. I would stay here again. Very Pleased.

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Orlando Kissimmee Main Gate East
HotelInfo.Address: 5731 West Irlo Bronson Highway, Kissimmee, FL 34746
